name: Unnamed Unity Project
description:
A simple shoot 'em up, bullet hell styled game that supports up to 4 players, join at any time. Fight powerful bosses with limited ammo, requiring you to obtain pickups, and dodge attacks.

16:9 is recommended for the best experience.

Controls:
Move: WASD / Left Stick
Shoot: O / South Button
Dodge: P / East Button

Credits:
Kenney, https://kenney.nl/ - Assets
